H0.text: A fish is an animal that has scales and uses only its lungs to exchange gases.

H1.text: A reptile is an animal that has scales and uses only its lungs to exchange gases.

H2.text: A mammal is an animal that has scales and uses only its lungs to exchange gases.

H3.text: An amphibian is the animal that has scales and uses only its lungs to exchange gases.

A5.text: Even with these adaptations, breathing is never fully accomplished without lungs.
